Report.Query: SELECT OP_DATE as searchdate, ROUTE_ID as routeid, ROUTE_NAME as routename, PLAN_DIS_COUNT as plancount, ACT_DIS_COUNT as actcount, BUS_COUNT as buscount, OP_MILE as opmile, PASSFLOW as passflows, FIRST_DISPATCH as firsttime, LAST_DISPATCH as lasttime, FL_ONTIME_RATIO as flratio, ROUTE_ONTIME_RATIO as routeratio, OP_QTY as opqty, AREA_CODE as areacode, ORG_GROUP as orgname, ORG_GROUP_ID as orgid, row_number() over (order by ROUTE_ID) as RowNumber, count(*) over () as TotalItems, sum(op_mile) over () as TotalSumOpmile, avg(op_mile) over () as TotalAverageOpmile, sum(PASSFLOW) over () as TotalSumPassflows, avg(PASSFLOW) over () as TotalAveragePassflows FROM rpt_route_info_tmp
